thread.title: California Hires Eric Holder to Lead Legal Fight Against Trump
thread.title_full: California Hires Eric Holder to Lead Legal Fight Against Trump

author: Jerome Hudson
title: California Hires Eric Holder to Lead Legal Fight Against Trump

organizations.name: california hires eric holder to lead legal fight against trump united states
robert f. kennedy department of justice

text: UNITED STATES, Washington : WASHINGTON, DC - MARCH 04: Attorney General Eric Holder delivers remarks about the Justice Department's findings related to two investigations in Ferguson, Missouri, at the Robert F. Kennedy Department of Justice Building March 4, 2015 in Washington, DC. Holder delivered the remarks for an audience of department employees who worked on the investigations after a white police officer shot and killed an unarmed black teenager, sparking weeks of demonstrations and violent clashes. Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images/AFP
